u-calendar-table/data-source-parent.description: The main data source of the calendar table, the array represents direct data, and the function needs to return a Promise

u-calendar-table/data-source.description: The calendar table sub-data source, the array represents direct data, the function needs to return a Promise

u-calendar-table/first-title.description: The title of the first item in the table

u-calendar-table/first-field.description: The identifier of the first item in the table in the data-source

u-calendar-table/parent-key.description: Key field in the primary data source, used to associate data from the primary and sub-data sources

u-calendar-table/child-key.description: Key field in the sub-data source, used to associate data from the main/sub-data sources

u-calendar-table/data-schema.description: The data type of each item in the calendar table

u-calendar-table/start-key.description: The field in the data indicating the start time

u-calendar-table/end-key.description: The field in the data indicating the end time

u-calendar-table/min-date.description: Minimum date, default is 5 years ago

u-calendar-table/max-date.description: Maximum date, default is 4 years later

u-calendar-table/width.description: The width of each item in the table, the default value is 48, which means '48px'

u-calendar-table/first-width.description: Width of the first item in the table, default 64 means '64px'
